cells.data:
ansible all -i hosts -m shell -a "swapoff --all" --become
 ansible all -i hosts -m shell -a "free"
 
# For permanent
apt-get remove dphys-swapfile
ansible all -i hosts -m shell -a "apt-get remove dphys-swapfile" --become
ansible  all -i hosts -m apt -a "name=dphys-swapfile state=absent" -f 5 --become

# Ansible background commands
ansible all -a "/usr/bin/somescript" -B 3600 -P 0
